ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to delete the User Binding resource from.

UserSid.description: The SID of the [User](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/user-resource) with the User Binding resources to delete.  See [push notification configuration](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/push-notification-configuration) for more info.

Sid.description: The SID of the User Binding resource to delete.
